paragraphs.content: A Song of degrees of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song of degrees of David.

paragraphs.content: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.

paragraphs.content: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.

paragraphs.content: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let Israel hope in the Lord from henceforth and for ever.
